title: Pilots at Southwest Sue Boeing. What That Could Mean for Boeing Stock.
text:
Southwest Airlines pilots are suing Boeing, and that is more bad news for the commercial aerospace giant.

The lawsuit, which seeks compensation for almost 10,000 pilots who have lost wages because of the grounding of Boeing’s 373 MAX jetliner, illustrates that even when the MAX returns to service—as industry stakeholders widely expect—Boeing has a lot of work to do restore trust with its airline customers and the flying public. description: A lawsuit by Southwest Airlines pilots illustrates that Boeing has a lot of work to do restore trust with its airline customers, as well as with the flying public. It also means the stock could trade in a tight range.
